This category could have also been called crafting, gifting, or tied into the reuse category. "Creating" encompasses all of the items that we can make. Whether this be for gifting, for our own use, or just other projects that we can become immersed in, creating plays a pivotal role in living a sustainable life. By calling upon creativity, we can utilize this attribute to solve climate issues and adapt our daily practices.
